I always trained 2 characters that complemented each other, such as a Druid 
and a Mage, a Thief and a Fighter, and the one I love to do, Thief and 
Archmage. The Archmage can conjure 4+ fire elementals, while the thief charms 
people.                       

And if Tom reads this, good job releasing WCIII ( I think he's at 
blizzard..... )
